name: Gobber
description:
Goal: Eat the yellow pebbles to protect the wooden wall. You have 10 lives, so this game is a little easy.

This game uses controller & keyboard input.

I recommend using the Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, since that was the controller I used to test this game.

Controller:

Left stick: Move left or right

A: Eat

Keyboard:

A/D: Move left or right

Space: Eat
